channel.title: New hit marks (fading, floating, etc) [PI]
channel.description: Well, I followed [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516825.0.html]this tutorial..[/url] No errors come up, but my problem is that when a player uses any type of attack style, the attack does deal damage but the mask shows a 0. Like for example.. If I were to hit say, a 10? it would show the damage on the health bar and show the icon for wich attack style it is, but the mask would be a 0? [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/jfxe79.png[/img]

item.title: New hit marks (fading, floating, etc) [PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

Well, I followed this tutorial…
No errors come up, but my problem is that when a player uses any type of attack style, the attack does deal damage but the mask shows a 0. Like for example… If I were to hit say, a 10? it would show the damage on the health bar and show the icon for wich attack style it is, but the mask would be a 0?

Read full topic
